subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mike Dyer bulled through the line for a game-saving touchdown with 30 seconds left as the 23rd-ranked Tigers scored twice in the final 2 minutes to escape with a 42-38 win.
snippet: Mike Dyer bulled through the line for a game-saving touchdown with 30 seconds left as the 23rd-ranked Tigers scored twice in the final 2 minutes to escape with a 42-38 win.
